name: Monztarz
description:
Monztarz is an education simulation game for children ages 3-9, The aim of the game is to take care of you pet Monztarz needs. You can feed them to keep there hunger up and by them toys to keep there happiness up!

You can play mini games to earn more coins to buy different foods and toys for your pet Monztar. Mini games include, Recycling collection game, Food Match and Maths quiz!

Have fun taking care of your little Monztarz!
